__TOC__

* Contact: RoyWilliams
* Make: Dell
* Model: Inspiron 2600

----
* Processor : Intel(R) Pentium(R) III M processor 600 Mhz
* Chipset : Intel 82830 i830
* Southbridge : Intel 82801
* Memory : SDRAM 256 MB
* Touchpad : Synaptics GlidePoint
* Audio : PCTel AC97
* NIC : Generic Prism-2 Compliant Card
* Video : Intel i830
* Display : 1024x768
----

=== Current Issues ===

Hoary failed, I also ran into a BIOS issue within the 2600 series I had to run A07 to even get the laptop functioning so a downgrade is needed for those in the same situation as me.
